summary: The Peanuts gang goes to summer camp, and they participate in a river-raft race against some cheating bullies.
cast: Duncan Watson|Greg Felton|Stuart Brotman|Gail Davis|Liam Martin|Kirk Jue|Jordan Warren|Jimmy Ahrens|Melanie Kohn|Tom Muller|Bill Melendez|Fred Van Amburg|Joseph Biter
keywords: summer camp|peanuts|based on comic strip|river|raft race
title: Race for Your Life, Charlie Brown
